scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: cd frontend && npm run test && cd ../backend && npm run test
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && docker-compose up -d postgres redis
